means: （争议一方的情况或论点）要点摘录

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"简短的，简洁的"之意。
means: brief ： 指语言文学简明扼要，短小精悍，也用于指时间意义很强的短暂的过程。
concise ： 书面用词，可与brief换用，指语言文学言简意赅，无多余的话。
compact ： 指为了方便把某物压缩到最小程度，也指紧凑、简洁的文体。

sentence.Network_en: A guide gives a brief talk on the history of the site.
sentence.Network_cn: 导游简要地介绍了那个遗址的历史。

sentence.Network_en: Now please be brief — my time is valuable.
sentence.Network_cn: 请长话短说——我的时间宝贵。

sentence.Network_en: This is a brief stop to take on passengers and water.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一次短暂停靠，上上客，加加水。

jx.jx_en_mean: not support or argue in favour of

lj.lj_ly: I hold no brief for dishonest policemen.
lj.lj_ls: 我不为不诚实的警察辩护。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French brief, from Latin brevis 'short'. The noun is via late Latin breve 'note, dispatch', hence 'an official letter'

encyclopedia.content: 简介 《吊带袜天使》人物之一，往来堕天城的御宅系大学生。 个性羞涩却对潘迪一见钟情，并开始追求她。【被panty称作“死宅（GEEK BOY）”.】 貌似GARTER对他有意思【各种场景包括笔记本里那个“G和B“ 个人认为“B”就是指brief】 真实身份是个财团家族的公子，在头发之下是个帅哥。（详见吊带袜天使第12集） brief 中文翻译可指“男性内裤” ，发音近似“三角裤”（ブリーフ，Bu rifu)。 他的[XX]【←你们懂的】是开启堕天城地

entry.def: Something that is brief lasts for only a short time.

example.ex: She once made a brief appearance on television...
example.tran: 她曾经在电视上短暂露面。

example.ex: This time their visit is brief.
example.tran: 他们这次的访问时间很短。

entry.def: A brief speech or piece of writing does not contain too many words or details.

example.ex: In a brief statement, he concentrated entirely on international affairs...
example.tran: 他作了一个简短的声明，集中阐述了在国际事务方面的立场。

example.ex: Write a very brief description of a typical problem.
example.tran: 就一个典型问题作简要的描述。

entry.def: If you are brief, you say what you want to say in as few words as possible.

example.ex: Now please be brief — my time is valuable...
example.tran: 请长话短说——我的时间宝贵。

example.ex: I hope to be brief and to the point.
example.tran: 我希望简明扼要，抓住重点。

entry.def: You can describe a period of time as brief if you want to emphasize that it is very short.

example.ex: For a few brief minutes we forgot the anxiety and anguish.
example.tran: 短短几分钟我们就忘记了焦虑与苦恼。

entry.def: Men's or women's  underpants can be referred to as briefs .

example.ex: A bra and a pair of briefs lay on the floor.
example.tran: 地板上有一个胸罩和一条短内裤。

entry.tran: （尤指就某项工作或某一重大事件）向…简要介绍情况
entry.def: If someone briefs you, especially about a piece of work or a serious matter, they give you information that you need before you do it or consider it.

example.ex: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters...
example.tran: 一位国防部发言人向记者们简要介绍了情况。

example.ex: The Prime Minister has been briefed by her parliamentary aides.
example.tran: 首相已听取了她议会助手的简要汇报。

entry.def: If someone gives you a brief, they officially give you responsibility for dealing with a particular thing.

example.ex: ...customs officials with a brief to stop foreign porn coming into Britain.
example.tran: 受命阻止国外淫秽出版物流入英国的海关官员

entry.def: If you refer to something in brief, you are referring to a shortened version of it with few details.
You can say in brief to indicate that you are about to say something in as few words as possible or to give a summary of what you have just said.

means.word_mean: 1. a document stating the facts and points of law of a client's case
2. a condensed written summary or abstract

sentences.sentence: "The reporters were briefed about the President's plan to invade"
"covered the matter in a brief statement"

stems_affixes.word_buile: brev短,缩短+ity状态→短的状态→短暂,简短
ab再+brev短+iate表动词→再弄短→缩写

Sentence.sentence: Make a brief self-introduction on the phone.
She'd wake up early, turn on her laptop and chat on Internet dating sites and instant-messaging programs – leaving her bed for only brief intervals.

But there is also time for brief diversions onto bizarre ground, such as a discussion of the skyscraper index (which holds that a boom in skyscraper construction is a foolproof sign of an imminent recessio.
By the 1950s, most schools required a brief personal statement of why the student had chosen to apply to one school over another.
When those were finished, she concluded the session with a brief restatement of how the new system would improve security and peace of mind in the municipal building.

sentences.en: There was a brief pause in the conversation.
She had time to give a brief report.
sentences.cn: 她有时间做一个简短的报告。

sentences.en: Time is limited, please be brief.
sentences.cn: 时间有限, 请讲得简洁些。

means.word_mean: 向…介绍基本情况, 作…的摘要

sentences.en: She briefed me on the case.
sentences.cn: 她向我简要说明了这个案子。

means.word_mean: (尤指事前)向…介绍基本情况，向…吹风；向…下达简令；在…事先向…做简要指点，向…布置简要任务(about，on)

sentences.en: He briefed all the agents before assigning them.
sentences.cn: 他在指派代理人之前向他们所有人布置了简要任务。

sentences.en: To begin with, I'd like to tell in brief the importance of the work.
sentences.cn: 首先, 我想简要谈谈这项工作的重要性。

jushi.english: She had time to give a brief report.
jushi.chinese: 她有时间做一个简短的报告。

jushi.english: There was a brief pause in the conversation.
